content.text:
# Live in Japan (B. B. King album)

}}
Live in Japan is a live album by B. B. King recorded in Sankei Hall, Tokyo on March 4 and 6, 1971, and released 1971 only in Japan as double LP. It was reissued 1999 for the first time outside Japan.
Track listing
#"Every Day I Have the Blues" - 2:10
#"How Blue Can You Get?" - 5:17
#"Eyesight to the Blind" - 4:03
#"Niji Baby" - 6:27
#"You're Still My Woman" - 5:56
#"Chains and Things" - 5:41
#"Sweet Sixteen" - 6:00
#"Hummingbird" - 4:08
#"Darlin' You Know I Love You" - 4:26
#"Japanese Boogie" - 9:17
#"Jamming at Sankei Hall" - 9:35
#"The Thrill Is Gone" - 5:36
#"Hikari #88" - 7:57
Personnel
*B.B. King - guitar, vocals
*Wilbert Freeman - bass
*Ron Levy - piano
*Sonny Freeman - drums
*Earl Turbington, Louis Hubert - saxophone
*Joe Burton - trombone
*John Browning - trumpet
